data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI- LODR UPDATES
data.news_body: REPLY AND CLARIFICATION ON PRICE MOVEMENT SOUGHT BY BSE LIMITED

data.caption: Clarification sought from AAA Technologies Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from AAA Technologies Ltd on January 19 2026 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Draft Letter of Offer
data.news_body: Mark Corporate Advisors Pvt Ltd ("Manager to the Offer") has submitted to BSE a copy of Draft Letter of Offer to the eligible Equity Shareholde of AAA Technologies Ltd ("Target Company").

data.caption: Detailed Public Statement
data.news_body: Mark Corporate Advisors Pvt Ltd ("Manager to the Offer") has submitted to BSE a copy of Detailed Public Statement under Regulations 13(4) 14(3) and 15(2) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeover) Regulations 2011 as amended for the attention of the Public Shareholders of AAA Technologies Ltd ("Target Company").

data.caption: Open Offer
data.news_body: Mark Corporate Advisors Pvt Ltd ("Manager to the Offer") has submitted to BSE a copy of Public Announcement under Regulations 3(1) and 4 read with Regulations 13(1) 14 and 15(1) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeover) Regulations 2011 and subsequent amendments thereto  for the attention of the Public Shareholders of AAA Technologies Ltd ("Target Company").
